website_summaries.verdict: This is a highly-rated bike helmet for adults, but at an entry-level price. Ideal for riders who want to find a good helmet and bike color scheme match.
pros: Wide variety of color schemes available
Uses durable plastic and foam components for maximum head protection
cons: Adjustment straps can slip out of position
Riders with larger heads may not get a good fit

customer_reviews.title: This helmet could be so much better with a simple hardware upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet looks great and the general construction seems to be just fine. This helmet would get five stars from me except for one important shortcoming: The plastic guides on each side that are used to adjust the straps do not lock, so the straps can slip out of proper adjustment. Since proper fitting is critical for any helmet to protect you in a fall, this oversight makes the helmet less than ideal. Depending on the size and shape of your head, the design may work okay for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for Recreational Biker
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easily adjustable, chin strap is comfortable and doesn't rub. Carbon fiber design Ladies heads up! Low pony-tails only!
customer_reviews.author: Alex fo Falex

customer_reviews.title: Fits and feels very well!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet. Nice adjustments. Worn it on a few rides already and feels great on. Lots of ventilation! Like the visor that comes with it too. Did a lot of research on helmets and found out that just because there is a famous name on a helmet didn't make it any better. As long as it's certified, and this one is, it meets all crash standards.
customer_reviews.author: RicijazTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: And it's not comfortable. I included a closeup where you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a helmet that got stolen along with a bike. It fits, and has that dial thing in the back to make sure it fits right. But the front has this bump that sits at your forehead. And it's not comfortable. I included a closeup where you can see the bump at the front of the helmet, and the padding doesn't help enough.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This bike helmet looked pretty decent when i received it but unfortunately started breaking down after barely a week of use. The strap which tightens the helmet snapped and now I need to tie the strap in a knot in order to use the helmet! Which is a shame since I really liked this helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Straps won't stay tight. Tilts to the side constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: Straps won't stay tight. Tilts to the side constantly. I measured my head to make sure this helmet would fit and it never tightens to the right amount. Very junky. I couldn't even donate it because I was afraid of giving someone false hope of safety.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, unsafe, and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've had this helmet for over a year, and I only use it when I can't find my better helmet. This helmet is terrible. If you don't tighten the straps, the helmet flops around. I'm certain if you fall, the helmet will move and you'll smash your head. Even if you *do* tighten the straps (which is the only way to keep it in-place+safe), it chokes you and doesn't stay tight for more than a minute. I've tried adjusting the straps in every way possible, but it always chokes you and becomes loose within a minute of putting it on... Pay a few extra dollars and get a *safe* and comfortable helmet you can try on in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Matthew Radens

customer_reviews.title: Good lightwieght helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is the first helmet I've ever owned, after owning this bike for over 40 years. It is very lightweight but very sturdy and well cushioned. It is also very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish is nice. Only problem for some is they only have ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value for the money. Compared to name brands it's hard to go wrong at this price. Fit and finish is nice. Only problem for some is they only have one size. It fits my GF (who has a small/medium head) great, especially with the adjustable headband. May not work with those who need a large helmet. They are almost giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It's a shame because I loved the color
customer_reviews.text: The helmet did not fit at all. It's a shame because I loved the color. I wore it on a 3 hr. ride. It kept tilting to the side. I found myself fussing with it, trying to adjust the straps on the side and the back during the entire ride. It fit like a bowl on my head with straps attached. :(
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Caution do not buy for your children
customer_reviews.text: Caution do not buy for your children this helmet turned out to be a piece of junk. The two rivets that hold the headgear in place barely go inside and they are glued as soon as it gets warm it comes off. Rendering it not safe at all for anyone.I'm glad I'm in adult I can't imagine any child wearing this and being safe let alone an adult!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jena J.

customer_reviews.title: Did not include the visor, but they made it more than right.
customer_reviews.text: I like the helmet...this is the second one I purchased. I got this for my wife because I really like the one I bought for myself. However, this one did not include the visor as listed in the description. It has reflective strips alonf the sides, and is very comfortable and lightweight. Overall, I really don't think you can beat the quality for the price. **Update...I contacted Amazon Customer Service and they sent a whole replacement helmet. The customer service with Amazon is unmatched.
customer_reviews.author: ReVu Link

customer_reviews.title: Avoid unless your  have small head
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps good for anyone with small head. I am an average size man and the short straps make it useless. Head size adjustment is primitive. Good front to back but no side to side adjustment. I am going to a bike shop now that I've lost the bet with myself that this cheapie might work. It is stylish though.
customer_reviews.author: drg

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a head on the bigger side. We have been looking for a helmet for him for almost a year. I spent a ton of time going through all the ones marked as Large on Amazon. This was the one that claimed to be the biggest, so I ordered it. I was pleasantly surprised that it was indeed larger than others. It hits him perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: tina nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Jimmy Neutron Head
customer_reviews.text: So my head is huge and I have braids and it fit. I have to like push it down kind of hard and keep moving it back and forth to get my head in but, I'M IN! I did have to sew the ends so that clamp would stop sliding off because I had to extend it so far
customer_reviews.author: XMASHIGHWAY

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50 and out of shape. I decided to try bike riding to get some needed exercise. I hate wearing a bike helmet, but I am not as stable on the bike as I was 20 years ago, so would benefit my safety. Also, in my state the law says you have to wear one. It is very lightweight and comfortable. I like the removable visor. Sometimes really need it because of the sun but don't have to have it on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: my3sons

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable and better built than a Giro that I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable and better built than a Giro that I had before, and for leas than half the price. I was impreased by the fit, the overall design and the price. It also came in a pouch, which was a nice touch. Let's see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: W.A

customer_reviews.title: decent helmet with poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: As should be expected when ordering from generic sizing with no specifics, the fit is terrible. it is too small, I could probably pull the straps tight enough to use it but the cheap construction makes me think I would tear the straps loose before I achieved a good fit. I can use it as is until I can buy a better helmet in a specific size. it's usable but not at all what I hoped for
customer_reviews.author: Keith G.

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a lightweight helmet, this is it
customer_reviews.text: I took a nasty fall, inside my house, and caused a brain bleed. I’m old so doctors orders to wear a helmet when I ride my bike or go for a walk. This works for me so it is comfortable, lightweight, and affordable. Not sure if your a seriously active bike rider if this would do the job. But it’s perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: mary glanton

customer_reviews.title: Works only for round heads - and I don't know anybody with one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my teenage son. The helmet is very adjustable front-to-back, but it is completely round inside, so my son could fit his whole hand under the side of the helmet - with room to spare. My husband, who has a fairly large head, tried it next. However tightly he adjusted the straps, the helmet was still loose on his head, because it was not snug on the sides. The helmet is completely useless - sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I love this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fit better than all my other bike helmets. It has a snug feel, and the snap on/snap off straps are easy to adjust and clip on and off. The helmet feels good on your head and its got sides that protrude down a little, making it feel safer. It has a great cut to it too, and the colors are nice! P.S. The seller of this helmet was also great! The item was as described and the delivery was timely. I would highly recommend that you buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: S.I.

customer_reviews.title: It fits like a square
customer_reviews.text: Ugh - don't get this. It fits like a square. Too big on the sizes and tight on the forehead. Horrible fit. I returned IMMEDIATELY. Zero safety insurance. It's slipped right off my head even when I tighten the dial.
customer_reviews.author: Spyra85

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. Adjusting the fit is easy and it sits securely, but he says it's the most comfortable bike helmet he's had. Side note, he has a large head that we have a hard time finding things that fit. The quick dial knob can adjust this helmet to fit small to large head sizes quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet! Very lightweight, fits great, very , straps are plenty long (I have a big head for a woman almost 24"), seems to be well made and love the dial adjust in the back of the helmet. My only problem with the helmet is the one I ordered was the gradient green where it's yellow in front and green towards the middle and back. I received a green one...☹️ Oh well still like the color and love the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Riften

customer_reviews.title: Great value but have some adjustment issues
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, is inexpensive, but I have some problems preventing it from rotating to front and back. I can cinch it down but it is uncomfortable on the throat. I will keep working on the adjustment but the silly "user's manual" is a tiny leaflet, with the photos captioned in 2 point font. And the document is not a pdf on their web site. Totally ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Yee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Comfortable, Lightweight, Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love these helmets so much that I bought one for all four of us! They are great quality, very comfortable, lightweight, and breathable, and also attractively designed. We bought four different colors and they all look GREAT. They're also very easily adjustable. We all love our new helmets. These are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Hoop Mama

customer_reviews.title: Returned for poor fit
customer_reviews.text: If your head is shaped like a melon, this might fit you. When I put it on, there was too much space on the sides, and the adjuster doesn't take care of that. Also didn't like: small separate velcro'ed pads easy to shift out of position, come off and lose. Decided to spend a little more money, get a better helmet, and hopefully a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: tideguy

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight and comfortable to where. No problem in the heat.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and feel on my head. The "visor" is small I thought but it went on easy and worked well. The plastic clip strap is easy to fasten and holds the helmet in place on me. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbeatable (price/value), light weight helmet that should fit most average-size adults. Although extremely light weight, it still appears to be strong enough to take a good blow to the head. The helmet is fully adjustable to fit comfortably...but lacks much soft padding, which could a factor for people without any head hair...I find it to be very comfortable, but I have hair. Besides the extremely affordable price, I like the wide range of color options.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Travis

customer_reviews.title: Adjuster broke 3 weeks in
customer_reviews.text: The adjuster broke after 3 weeks of use. The helmet overall looks good (I'm not an expert), but to have the dial break out of nowhere it must be cheap material. You get what you pay for, that's why I'm not mad and I think 3 stars is fair. I can still wear it though, just no dial adjuster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. There is a piece on the inside of the helmet that is attached by a small piece of velcro. It is on the inside cushion that goes around the head. Bought 2 helmets and the piece fell off immediately on both and will not stay attached. Come on folks, it is 2020, no excuse for not being able to have this piece stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: Tom McDermitt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Helmet color not as advertised (see picture, supposed to be half yellow half lime). Sides are too wide and has a loose fit even when straps are tightened ={
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great helmet for a new adult daily biker. The comfort is decent although after about an hour I do find it gets a little uncomfortable and slightly hot however I know other cheaper models would be worse. Eventually I may upgrade to something else but for the time this is serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a very good everyday helmet
customer_reviews.text: I use my helmet for casual biking on a paved bike trail. The helmet is lightweight and fits well. The knob adjuster at the back of the helmet is very effective -- no Velcro !!, no need to add material to fill gaps. Another reviewer mentioned the helmet material at the front can "dent" your forehead. So, DON'T TIGHTEN THE KNOB ADJUSTER SO FAR THAT IS TOO TIGHT !! Because the helmet is lightweight it is very comfortable. It is more round than oval.
customer_reviews.author: DT guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Decals but i like the blue and orange
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, almost no padding, and they can't even align the cheap decals correctly. Attempted to return item but then they wanted to charge me an $11 return shipping fee which is almost HALF the purchase cost to begin with. This item was a FAIL in comparrison to others at the same price, but it is Blue and Orange (Go Broncos) and I suppose it would protect my head as its primary function so 2 stars no more. 1 if you aren't sold on the colors like I was..
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chema

customer_reviews.title: Incredible helmet for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when this helmet arrived because I was expecting a much lesser product because it was so inexpensive. Again, I was shocked the moment I took it out of the box. Copious amounts of padding, light, comfortable, and clearly a quality helmet and a well made product. Very impressed with this company and would not hesitate to purchase from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gino diFonzo

customer_reviews.title: Fits my husband's kind of big head well!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly a little worried I wouldn't find a bike helmet that fit my husband's noggin but this works great! Lightweight and fits snug! Plus it's adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 9 yr old son
customer_reviews.text: Got this in adult size for my 9 year old son. It's adjustable in the back with the turn of the knob and fits him perfectly. It's definitely one he can keep a long time. Most of the youth sizes just didn't fit or he grew out of fast. My kid has a normal size head so I'm not sure why they make youth size so small. But this fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiG

customer_reviews.title: The helmet doesn't adjust properly
customer_reviews.text: The helmet kept shifting side ways like it was falling off her head. I thought she didn't know how to adjust it, so when we looked at it closer the inside of the helmet is so big and i have five mens helmets they were all smaller on the inside. So that leaves only the adjustment to properly adjusted it thats what sucks, i could not adjust to my wife head or mine it was either to small or to big. This is a guy thats had plenty of helmets through out his life. Don't Wast Your Money
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The chin strap's clasp rubs neck raw
customer_reviews.text: I bought two bike helmets, for my father and I. We both have normal size heads, and both helmets came with the straps too long. We tried out both helmets. There's one adjustable side, and one that's a fixed length. The best we could get with both helmets is the buckle/clasp digging into our Adam's apples, and the soft chin guard sleeve off to the side of our heads, beside our ears. I couldn't imagine riding around, enjoying myself, with this painful thing around my head. Otherwise, the helmet looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Snug, but Lightweight and Breathable
customer_reviews.text: It fits too tightly on my husband's head. We measured, but note that your measurements won't account for the extra padding, plastic gripping, inside. It takes a lot of adjusting, but fits snugly once in place. We will be getting a different type of helmet soon, but if you take into account the smaller size, you'll be okay if this is your preferred style. It is lightweight and very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: PheePhyPhoPhum

customer_reviews.title: Fit my fat a$$ head
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is adjustable which is great. It fit my head with more room to spare. There aren’t any instructions on how to fix the straps but I figured it out watching YouTube videos. Again, this helmet fit my huge head and my huge chin lol it’s a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Okay but soft padding in insufficient
customer_reviews.text: Wider in width and padding is thinner than most helmets I already have and that is why I am giving 3 stars. I will use some foam tape type insulation (like in other helmets I have) to resolve Otherwise it is a good helmet with nice strap placement that does not bind on your ears, plenty of holes for air circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder because l was involved in an awful crash. Bruised ribs and a hand size bruise on my thigh. This inside of the liner spilt but the helmet stayed together and protected my head. I wish it would have done the same for my bike. $500 REPAIR. OUCH. RECOMEND HIGHLY.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW  E  PELZER  III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet comfort is import along with safety and what a beautiful look
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is the bomb. Suck a nice looking helmet that fits great and is adjustable which was important. The colors are bad to the bone. A really nice look. The helmet is light as a feather. I put it on with all my biking gear and what a picture but I forgot to take one but I will and it will get posted. Seeing is believing. Nice look, adjustable fit and light weight so I have no cons on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great bike helmet for adults
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits a variety of heads im sure , I found the helmet to be very comfortable while looking to be very quality made that definitely gives an assurance of added protection. Again, I must say that in my opinion it's as good as the more and I mean way more exspensive helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny W

customer_reviews.title: I received what I thought was a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I received what I thought was a great value for the money. I did return the item for the simple reason that this particular color is depicted as yellow and green. After the visor was attached, the yellow was completely obscured, leaving only the green showing. The value was so good though, I did order another solid-colored helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: The helmet itself looks sturdy enough but the straps are extremely unstable
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself looks sturdy enough but the straps are extremely unstable. A little pull and the straps come apart from the buckle. I've had it for less than a week and the buckle has already fallen off three times. The straps also loosen mid-ride (and I usually only bike for a maximum of twenty minutes because I just use it to go from class to class on my college campus) so I could have just tightened them before getting on my bike only for the helmet to start tilting off five minutes in. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hiep M. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Helmet Is Fine—Visor Is Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I like this helmet, and I believes that it offers me good protection; however, the visor was flimsy from the start. Within a couple of weeks I had broken. I removed it completely from the helmet because by then it was more trouble than it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Truly Extra Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for a friend who has an extra large head. It is the first helmet he is able to adjust for different head coverings worn under the helmet and he is very pleased. I give it four stars because of the foam thickness is on the thin side.
customer_reviews.author: John A McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and is light
customer_reviews.text: Helmet was very adjustable. I have a small adult head and I was able to adjust it to fit well. It is a light helmet but seems very sturdy. One note though. This was described as being dark blue and it is more a green teal. I really wanted it to match my bike which is dark blue, but I can't see returning it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer C Defibaugh

customer_reviews.title: Can't Attach Visor
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to snap the visor on, as the holes where it should snap into are plugged with plastic - it is like a step in manufacturing was missed. So the helmet part is fine - but the visor will not attach.
customer_reviews.author: stevied

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and bought two for my teen son and myself. Nice interior liners, thick, and washable. The visor snaps in fine and easy head size adjustment. Great helmet and reasonably priced....recommended .
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet. Bought this from Amazon because the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet. Bought this from Amazon because the price is good. I went to local store (Walmart) and the line up was limited and range a bit in the mid to upper $20. This one is just right, reviews look good. After getting the product, i was impressed by the quality. The plastic top is molded on to the foam, comparable to the more expensive one at my local store. Nice fit with comfortable chin strap. Wear it on multiple long rides so far in FL weather, and this helmet work just fine. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Oh

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy and not too stylish but for the price point you won't find a more durable helmet. I appreciate that the visor detaches but I wish that it stayed on more snuggly. Still a great buy for my purposes!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent except
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fits well overall with easy adjustment for head size except for the chin strap. It's too short even when adjust to its maximum length which makes it overly snug when done up. Without the chin strap, the benefit of the helmet is questionable so it's a choice between comfort or safety. Another inch or two on the length of the chin strap would make all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Haegele

customer_reviews.title: Not for large heads
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money but.... I usually have to buy extra large and took a risk buying this. It just fits, but feels a little like it is perched on top of my head - not sure how effective it would be in a crash. The device which covers the buckle is useless. So, if you have a large head you are probably better off not buying this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: 123 degrees west

customer_reviews.title: fits well, very good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this helmet, especially, but not only, given the very good price. It fits well. It seems up to the task, though hopefully I'll never find out if it really is.... Thanks
customer_reviews.author: M.Frankelman

customer_reviews.title: Fits my dome!
customer_reviews.text: This bike helmet was very reasonable and I am happy with my purchase. The helmet is light and pretty comfortable to wear. I certainly recommend this helmet for a good price and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Hit Man Hearne

customer_reviews.title: Good Item, safety first
customer_reviews.text: The item came rather quickly and it was inexpensive. I am not sure if they use universal sizing. I had a previous helmet size large from another vendor and it fit perfectly. This one is a bit tight. I double checked the size and it also says large. It may just be the way its made. I appreciate the added visor. I would recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan T

customer_reviews.title: Large helmet
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head and most standard helmets don’t fit me, so I took a bit of a gamble ordering online. Glad I did! These fit me well, and I was still able to adjust the fit and tighten it a bit. Color wasn’t the best but I got the cheapest one available so I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: JuneBug1783

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression was positive. Shiny and bright and comfortable at first. However, soon became apparent that build quality was lacking. The visor is held in place by two little pegs on each side. Well one on each side broke off, so now the whole thing rotates down so that it covers the eyes... Not good. Then all the little pads started falling out of the inside. Just fluttering out at random times when I take the helmet off so now it's unpadded. If you need a helmet that lasts more than a few rides, I would look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Most likely a counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The low price was too good to be true. Very flimsy, light weight, with no safety certification stickers. I am pretty sure this is a counterfeit helmet, especially after reading an article in how often fake bike helmets are being sold on the internet. These things do not pass safety checks. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: JCButler

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is easy to adjust front-to-back with the knob you turn, but it was too wide side-to-side. I added padding from another helmet to help it fit better. It's not the most comfortable, but it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin K

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a fully adjustable lightweight and well vented bike helmet. I also have a more expensive Gyro helmet bit I prefer this one. It can be easily modified for road biking by removing the snap-on visor. For the money, it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight to wear, fit to my head perfectly, easy to carry. Don’t know much about the safety, feels like solid quality. Need wear it for w while to test it. Anyway, all good, worth the price
customer_reviews.author: WannianGhost

customer_reviews.title: Well made helmet, just a bit too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made helmet, just a bit too big for small head. I have learned that I need to buy "women's" helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Sodamancer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 of these helmets, one for my husband and 4 for children ranging in age from 11 to 18. There is a knob for size adjustment that worked well to customize the fit. What my husband really likes about the helmet is how much air it let run through, really nice for hot summer bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Beth T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and secure helmet, perfect for people who take riding seriously.
customer_reviews.text: It is the most secure and comfortable helmet I have ever had. As soon as you put the JBM helmet on, you know your head is as safe as possible riding on the road. I am going to be buying one for my senior father, because I am that confident in the protection this helmet provides.
customer_reviews.author: John A. LoGiudice

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant as I was not sure if this would fit well. I wear a size 8 on fitted baseball caps and was not sure if this would do, but it fits with a little room to grow! Reason for 4 star review is the chin strap barely fits around my head. I had to take it to as far as it would go, but it fit. Just a little tight. Otherwise the product is very well made!
customer_reviews.author: BiGGJOHN

customer_reviews.title: O e size fits all adults
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for the price. I purchase helmets for a Special Olympic program as a donation. These are a one size fits all adults. So, we get several of different colors and let the athletes choose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive; well fitting, and beautiful adult bike helmet...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is adjustable, and fits nicely and snuggly on my head. It is comfortable to wear, and looks great, AND it is relatively inexpensive! Absolutely no complaints. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Hapeman

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It has been years since I've worn a bike helmet and I really had a negative attitude about them. Well, no more! This helmet is light and comfortable! The dial adjustment to snug it up is excellent, so easy to get a good fit. They all look similar, but this one is more attractive than the ones of my past. Great helmet at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Safety with looks
customer_reviews.text: After a bike accident in which my wife suffered a serious head injury, she had a complete recovery, she is wearing this helmet. I can only report on how it fits, (good) and how it looks, (she likes it), because the helmet has not been tested (thank God). We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat, not quite right
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is great and mostly comfortable. The color I got was Red Gradient and the helmet was way more gradient than red, the image looks like it is mostly red but it is much darker than the image. Otherwise it is a great helmet.
customer_reviews.author: BigChris

customer_reviews.title: Function an Price
customer_reviews.text: Impressed and under $15. Removable spoiler. I believe it would be tough to beat the function and price of this helmet. I hope I never need to fully test the function... Fits this big head fine.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helmet
customer_reviews.text: First let me start by saying that I only purchased this item because I told my 4 year old great nephew that he has to wear a helmet when riding his bike or he can't ride. So when I pulled my bike out to ride I had to set an example. I like the product, it fits well, it comes in many colors and it had great reviews so I am rating it five based on the points made above. I or someone will re-write the review when or if I fall to let you know how the helmet and my head held up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona64

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is too small for someone with a big head. The adjustable strap on the back doesn't tighten all the way to make the helmet feel snug and tight against my head. It fits loose.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Custom fit!
customer_reviews.text: Got one for me and my husband and they fit us both perfectly. The padded chin strap is a nice touch. It is very easy to adjust with a little knob in the back and the removable front piece is nice to keep the sun off of your face. The quality is really great for the price. We were going to get helmets double the price but are glad we got these. Hopefully we never have to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheanuh

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight, provides good airflow, and protection for bike helmet
customer_reviews.text: All good - lightweight, easy to adjust all available places, feels comfortable while riding, and love all the air holes. Much lighter than former helmet of decades ago. Very happy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: happygurl

customer_reviews.title: Very small, one size does not fit all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet due to its attractive price and style. Unfortunately, it only comes in one “adult” size which is on the small side. I consider myself to be an average sized adult male, about 6’ tall, 200 lbs. This helmet is so small that I cannot even fit it onto my head at all. It’s probably fine for most smaller women or men, but I would avoid if you consider yourself to be average size or bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is adequate for the price. However, the first picture shown for this helmet (Gradient Green) showed color changing from bright yellow in front to green in the back. That is what I wanted. However, what I got was light green changing to darker green. The other pictures shown in the Amazon description were very close to what I got, but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: bjhawkeye

customer_reviews.title: So affordable!
customer_reviews.text: A comparable helmet would cost at least $30 at a department store or sporting goods store. Lightweight. Sturdy construction. Very comfortable. Super easy to get a custom fit.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K. & Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10-year-old daughter and it fits perfectly. It is a good quality and comfortable fit. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA KENNEDY-SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband who is new to biking. It’s lightweight and has plenty of ventilation. Color unisex. Great price . Hope it protects his melon if he dumps his bike
customer_reviews.author: rhyagirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Helmet arrived on time and exactly as ordered. The minor adjustments to make it fit were very easy. I have only worn it twice but so far, is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight. Too light?
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is sooo light compared to my husbands Bell. I don't know how that equates to safety but does give me a slight cause for concern.
customer_reviews.author: Tn_momma

customer_reviews.title: The comfort of the fit this helmet would make anyone happy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ❤️ it I had a hard time finding this color
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M

customer_reviews.title: Great safety helmet for tornado shelter
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I purchased these for our tornado/emergency kit. I hope we don’t need to use them but am thankful to have them. The quality exceeded my expectations and my family loved them.
customer_reviews.author: craftemomma

customer_reviews.title: JBM adult cycling helmet
customer_reviews.text: Too bad, it fits well, looks OK, I have to assume it works (I'm not going to test it}. Problem, the visor will not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Leaky Bucket

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It will get the job done but I question the long term durability because some of the plastic bits are quite thin. I do not expect it to last more than a year or so before something breaks and renders it unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great fit and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike helmet as while out of town and renting a bicycle. I was amazed at the quality and how well this helmet fit. I liked it so well that I now prefer it over my $100 + helmet and now wear it on every ride. I can't believe the value of this product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: G. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking helmet but the fitment was terribly awkward as other users have pointed out and the straps were pretty tight also.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenvoyager

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Bike Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me when riding my new bike. Does the job. I have not fell off my bike with it on so I can't speak to that, but the helmet is sturdy and comfortable to wear. It matches my bike, so you can get it in different colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Trinese B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable biking helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for biking. Safety first... helmet is a must. I bought for someone and they love it and said it fits nicely and very comfortable while biking.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 9 year old well (they've got a big head). It was easy to adjust. It's lightweight and they love the colors! Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye7273

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This helmet does not fit well. It sits extremely high on the head leaving most of the temples and forehead exposed. The straps come down uncomfortably around the neck rather than under the chin for a secure comfortable fit. The plastic/styrofoam layers do not hold together well, causing it to feel low quality. The visor snapped off during the first use.
customer_reviews.author: scott K

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!
customer_reviews.text: Chinstrap chokes me, can see no method of adjustment. visor will not clip on unless it is upside down! Overall a feeble attempt at a helmet second one just returned
customer_reviews.author: Brit in LA

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our grandkids. The helmet is a great fit with easy adjustments. The reason for the four star rating is that the visor is poorly attached. Small plastic style pin head pops into holes in the helmet. Of the two helmets, we had to superglue one of the visors. The other issue was no reflector on the back of the helmet. Otherwise, both fit great on the grandkids and are easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: fits great
customer_reviews.text: My old helmet was about 20 years old, so long over due for a replacement. This one fits so well, is easy to adjust, and is so lightweight and comfortable. I am looking forward to many rides with it.
customer_reviews.author: elemiller

product_meta.title: JBM Adult Cycling Bike Helmet Specialized for Men Women Safety Protection CPSC Certified (18 Colors) Adjustable Lightweight Helmet
feature_bullets: CAN ADJUSTABLE TO DIFFERENT HEAD SIZE: This adult cycling helmet goes with a standard size, equipped with the easy-use dial system and side straps make this nutcase helmet adjustable to different head size and suitable for both men and women.

IMPACT RESISTANCE: This nutcase bike helmet is specially designed for adult rider. Material use the tough and durable PVC & PC, EPS foam which help absorb the impact and protect the head during crash.
VENTILATION: The adoption of specialized aerodynamic and ventilation design allow air go through the biking helmet which help increase the speed and keep stay cool.
LIGHTWEIGHT: This biking helmet made of lightweight material, the inner pad use of breathable material to wear comfortably.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
